# HUD::GET_BLIP_FROM_ENTITY

## Summary
Returns the blip attached to an entity (if any) INVALID BLIP otherwise

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity

## Returns
* **BLIP_INDEX**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the Blip handle of given Entity.
